response.original_title: The Unseen Scene: An Academy Film Archive Trailer Show
response.overview: Existing in the liminal space between marketing and art, trailers are multifaceted in their function: at worst, a blatant misrepresentation or catalyst of spoilers; at best, a film in miniature to be appreciated in its own right. Presented entirely on 35mm film, primarily sourced from the worldâ€™s largest collection of movie trailers at the Academy Film Archive, this program highlights classic coming attractions containing unique material created solely for promotion.
response.title: The Unseen Scene: An Academy Film Archive Trailer Show
